title.rendered: “Israeli Defense Forces Strike Hezbollah Targets in Response to Border Attacks: An Inside Look”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a series of targets in Lebanon in response to the launches towards the borders this morning.

Combat aircraft attacked a short while ago a series of targets of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Bint Jbeil, Al-Sultaniyah and Zadikin areas in response to the launches towards the border areas this morning. Among the targets attacked were military buildings and a military command that served the organization.

Following the alerts in the north of the country a short time ago, about ten launches were identified that crossed from Lebanese territory towards Israeli territory, some of them were intercepted and there were no casualties.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/3Ip0jjs
